title: FS: T206 Oddities 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Oddities 9/5 Through 9/7 Take 15% Off
posts.post_content:
FRIDAY SEPTEMBER 5 THROUGH SUNDAY SEPTEMBER 7 TAKE 15% OFF MY PRICES LISTED FOR ANY T206 CARD

Nothing earth shattering. Just a few from my purchase that were a bit odd.

Griffith Portrait...They really went overboard with the red on this one. The background has very little yellow. He also looks like he is wearing makeup. Red around the lips, cheeks, eyes and ears. Card is clipped but otherwise would be GD-VG. 3 very small light creases. Asking $150.

Dougherty Portrait...Background should be purple but this one is pretty much blue with only the slightest hint of purple specks. Card has no creases and is overall VG-EX. Asking $110

Shad Barry...No name. Or at least only a barely visible very top of a few letters. No creases but card is clipped and someone wrote "Barry" in pencil on border of card (which I find amusing as it was necessary because there is no name to be found at the bottom!). Asking $85

Nicholls....Not sure what is going on with this one. Color registration is off and it looks like he has war paint all over his face. Card has 1 inch crease at right and tiny scratch on border by throwing elbow. Overall GD+. Asking $130

Bergen...Double name top and bottom. No creases. Card is EX condition. Asking $100

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains007/OdditiesFront_zps33f60575.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains007/OdditiesBack_zps38185ec8.jpg[/IMG]


Just for reference...here is what a proper Dougherty and Griffith should look like:

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains008/dougherty_zpsf9c5692f.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains009/Griffith_zpsa43a6946.jpg[/IMG]

Tom C
Friday september 5 through sunday september 7 take 15% off my prices listed for any t206 card
